pageContext.geocode_address: 1060 Chandler Rd, Lake Oswego, OR 97034, USA
pageContext.public_note: Age/grade exceptions may apply on a case by case basis Please contact Lake Oswego Parks and Recreation for more information
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Bring Minecraft to life using tens of thousands of LEGO® parts!  Build engineer-designed projects such as a motorized Creeper, a portal to the Nether, and a moving Minecart! Create your favorite Minecraft objects with the guidance of an experienced Play-Well instructor.  Whether you are new to Minecraft and the LEGO® building system or a seasoned veteran, you'll be hooked on the endless creative possibilities.
